text: Newton Local High School is a public high school in Pleasant Hill, Ohio. It is the only high school in the Newton Local Schools district. Newton High School is a very small school. Their motto "Striving for Excellence" is well known. It is the center of Pleasant Hill, Ohio, and is located at 201 N. Long St. The old school building was constructed in the 1920s, but was demolished in 2010, and a new one built. ==Ohio High School Athletic Association State Championships== * Girls Softball - 2010 == External links == * District Website ==Notes and references== Category:High schools in Miami County, Ohio Category:Public high schools in Ohio
title: Newton High School (Ohio)
